trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to a string.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>為字串。

trans-unit.source: It also converts a string to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它也將字串轉換成<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The FontUnitConverter class is used to convert data to and from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> and string types.
trans-unit.target: FontUnitConverter 類別用來將資料轉換的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>和字串類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫適當的轉換程式

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName>中的範例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a data type can be converted to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定資料類型是否可以轉換成<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the CanConvertFrom method to determine whether the data type specified by the `sourceType` parameter can be converted to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否指定資料類型使用 CanConvertFrom 方法`sourceType`參數可以轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method will return true only if the `sourceType` is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會傳回為 true，則只有當`sourceType`為<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The only type this converter can convert into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一類型這個轉換器可以轉換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>為<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>實作提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to check.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> ，代表要檢查的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: if the data type specified by the sourceType parameter can be converted to a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果資料型別由指定 sourceType 參數可以轉換成 ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出轉換是否將<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>用於指定類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，表示要轉換的物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName>表示要轉換的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter supports converting a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the destination type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個轉換子支援轉換<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>物件的目的型別中; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method will return true only if the destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回為 true，則只有當 destinationType 為。

trans-unit.source: The only type this converter can convert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> into is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換器轉換的唯一類型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>的<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> in a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: 將物件轉換<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>中特定文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertFrom method to convert the object specified by the `value` parameter to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> in the culture specified by the `culture` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定的物件使用 ConvertFrom 方法`value`參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>中所指定的文化特性`culture`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified object is `null`, the returned value is also `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 指定的物件是否`null`，傳回的值也是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the specified object is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果指定的物件<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty>傳回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method can only convert a string to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只可以將字串轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>實作提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> ，指定要代表的文化特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>，當它以點為單位。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>表示已轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to an object with a different data type.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>具有不同的資料類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertTo method to convert the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter to an object with the data type specified by the `destinationType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ConvertTo 方法將轉換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>所指定`value`具有所指定之資料類型的物件參數`destinationType`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned from this method if the `value` parameter contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>如果從這個方法會傳回`value`參數包含`null`。</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is also returned if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter contains the value `FontSize.NotSet`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>如果也會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>所指定`value`參數包含值`FontSize.NotSet`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A></xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method can only convert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> to a string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只能轉換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>為字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>實作提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> ，指定要代表的文化特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>，當它以點為單位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName>表示要轉換的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>表示已轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, using the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>包含的標準值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>，使用指定的格式內容。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetStandardValues method to retrieve a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetStandardValues 方法來擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>的標準值</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This collection contains all the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class.
trans-unit.target: 此集合包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>中的所有欄位

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>包含的標準值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list of values, using the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues*>方法是使用指定的格式內容的值的獨占清單。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetStandardValuesExclusive method to determine whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is an exclusive list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetStandardValuesExclusive 方法來判斷是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法是值的獨占清單。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the list of values is not an exclusive list.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回覆寫這個方法`false`表示值的清單不是獨占清單。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref>從呼叫這個方法的類別支援的標準值集合，可以從使用指定的格式內容的清單中選取。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetStandardValuesSupported method to determine whether the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetStandardValuesSupported 方法來判斷是否執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter>從呼叫這個方法的類別支援的標準值集合，可以從使用指定的格式內容的清單中選取。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter>

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to always return `true` to indicate that this class supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回覆寫這個方法`true`來指示此類別支援的標準值集合，可以從清單中挑選。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供型別轉換子內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>所有案例。
